verses.verse: For <S%G1063><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> Melchizedek, <S%G3198><s%> king <S%G935><s%> of Salem, <S%G4532><s%> priest <S%G2409><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> most high <S%G5310><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> who met <S%G4876><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> returning <S%G5290><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> slaughter <S%G2871><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> kings, <S%G935><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> blessed <S%G2127><s%> him; <S%G846><s%>

To whom <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> gave <S%G3307><s%> a tenth part <S%G1181><s%> of <S%G575><s%> all; <S%G3956><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> <S%G3303><s%> being by interpretation <S%G2059><s%> King <S%G935><s%> of righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> after that <S%G1899><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> King <S%G935><s%> of Salem, <S%G4532><s%> which is, <S%G3603><s%> King <S%G935><s%> of peace; <S%G1515><s%>

Without father, <S%G540><s%> without mother, <S%G282><s%> without descent, <S%G35><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> neither <S%G3383><s%> beginning <S%G746><s%> of days, <S%G2250><s%> nor <S%G3383><s%> end <S%G5056><s%> of life; <S%G2222><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> made like unto <S%G871><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%> abideth <S%G3306><s%> a priest <S%G2409><s%> continually. <S%G1519><s%> <S%G1336><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> consider <S%G2334><s%> how great <S%G4080><s%> this man <S%G3778><s%> was, unto whom <S%G3739><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> patriarch <S%G3966><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> the tenth <S%G1181><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> spoils. <S%G205><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> verily <S%G3303><s%> they <S%G3588><s%> that are of <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sons <S%G5207><s%> of Levi, <S%G3017><s%> who receive <S%G2983><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> office of the priesthood, <S%G2405><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> a commandment <S%G1785><s%> to take tithes <S%G586><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> people <S%G2992><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> law, <S%G3551><s%> that is, <S%G5123><s%> of their <S%G848><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> though <S%G2539><s%> they come <S%G1831><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> loins <S%G3751><s%> of Abraham: <S%G11><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> he whose descent is not counted <S%G1075><s%> <S%G3361><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> them <S%G846><s%> received tithes <S%G1183><s%> of Abraham, <S%G11><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> blessed <S%G2127><s%> him that had <S%G2192><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> promises. <S%G1860><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> contradiction <S%G485><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> less <S%G1640><s%> is blessed <S%G2127><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> better. <S%G2909><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> <S%G3303><s%> men <S%G444><s%> that die <S%G599><s%> receive <S%G2983><s%> tithes; <S%G1181><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> he receiveth them, of whom it is witnessed <S%G3140><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he liveth. <S%G2198><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> as I may so say, <S%G5613><s%> <S%G2031><s%> <S%G2036><s%> Levi <S%G3017><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> who receiveth <S%G2983><s%> tithes, <S%G1181><s%> paid tithes <S%G1183><s%> in <S%G1223><s%> Abraham. <S%G11><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> he was <S%G2258><s%> yet <S%G2089><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> loins <S%G3751><s%> of his father, <S%G3962><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> Melchizedek <S%G3198><s%> met <S%G4876><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3303><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> perfection <S%G5050><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Levitical <S%G3020><s%> priesthood, <S%G2420><s%> (for <S%G1063><s%> under <S%G1909><s%> it <S%G846><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> people <S%G2992><s%> received the law,) <S%G3549><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> further <S%G2089><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> was there that another <S%G2087><s%> priest <S%G2409><s%> should rise <S%G450><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> order <S%G5010><s%> of Melchizedek, <S%G3198><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> be called <S%G3004><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> order <S%G5010><s%> of Aaron? <S%G2><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> priesthood <S%G2420><s%> being changed, <S%G3346><s%> there is made <S%G1096><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> necessity <S%G318><s%> a change <S%G3331><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> of the law. <S%G3551><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> he of <S%G1909><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> are spoken <S%G3004><s%> pertaineth <S%G3348><s%> to another <S%G2087><s%> tribe, <S%G5443><s%> of <S%G575><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> gave attendance <S%G4337><s%> at the <S%G3588><s%> altar. <S%G2379><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> it is evident <S%G4271><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> sprang <S%G393><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> Judah; <S%G2455><s%> of <S%G1519><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> tribe <S%G5443><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> spake <S%G2980><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> priesthood. <S%G2420><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> yet <S%G2089><s%> far more <S%G4054><s%> evident: <S%G2612><s%> for that <S%G1487><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> similitude <S%G3665><s%> of Melchizedek <S%G3198><s%> there ariseth <S%G450><s%> another <S%G2087><s%> priest, <S%G2409><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> is made, <S%G1096><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> of a carnal <S%G4559><s%> commandment, <S%G1785><s%> but <S%G235><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> of an endless <S%G179><s%> life. <S%G2222><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> he testifieth, <S%G3140><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> art a priest <S%G2409><s%> forever <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> order <S%G5010><s%> of Melchizedek. <S%G3198><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> there is <S%G1096><s%> verily <S%G3303><s%> a disannulling <S%G115><s%> of the commandment <S%G1785><s%> going before <S%G4254><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> weakness <S%G772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> unprofitableness <S%G512><s%> thereof. <S%G846><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> law <S%G3551><s%> made nothing perfect, <S%G5048><s%> <S%G3762><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> the bringing in <S%G1898><s%> of a better <S%G2909><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%> did; by <S%G1223><s%> the which <S%G3739><s%> we draw nigh <S%G1448><s%> unto God. <S%G2316><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> inasmuch as <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3745><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> an oath <S%G3728><s%> he was made priest:

(For <S%G1063><s%> those priests <S%G2409><s%> <S%G3303><s%> were <S%G1526><s%> made <S%G1096><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> an oath; <S%G3728><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> this <S%G3588><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> an oath <S%G3728><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> him that said <S%G3004><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> The Lord <S%G2962><s%> swore <S%G3660><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> will not <S%G3756><s%> repent, <S%G3338><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> art a priest <S%G2409><s%> forever <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> order <S%G5010><s%> of Melchizedek: ) <S%G3198><s%>
By <S%G2596><s%> so much <S%G5118><s%> was Jesus <S%G2424><s%> made <S%G1096><s%> a surety <S%G1450><s%> of a better <S%G2909><s%> testament. <S%G1242><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G3588><s%> truly <S%G3303><s%> were <S%G1526><s%> many <S%G4119><s%> priests, <S%G2409><s%> because they were not suffered <S%G2967><s%> to continue <S%G3887><s%> by reason of death: <S%G2288><s%>
But <S%G1161><s%> this <S%G3588><s%> man, because he <S%G846><s%> continueth <S%G3306><s%> ever, <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> an unchangeable <S%G531><s%> priesthood. <S%G2420><s%>

Wherefore <S%G3606><s%> he is able <S%G1410><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> to save <S%G4982><s%> them to <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> uttermost <S%G3838><s%> that come <S%G4334><s%> unto God <S%G2316><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> seeing he ever <S%G3842><s%> liveth <S%G2198><s%> to make intercession <S%G1793><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> a high priest <S%G749><s%> became <S%G4241><s%> us, <S%G2254><s%> who is holy, <S%G3741><s%> harmless, <S%G172><s%> undefiled, <S%G283><s%> separate <S%G5563><s%> from <S%G575><s%> sinners, <S%G268><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> made <S%G1096><s%> higher <S%G5308><s%> than the <S%G3588><s%> heavens; <S%G3772><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> needeth <S%G2192><s%> <S%G318><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> daily, <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2250><s%> as <S%G5618><s%> those high priests, <S%G749><s%> to offer up <S%G399><s%> sacrifice, <S%G2378><s%> first <S%G4386><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> sins, <S%G266><s%> and then <S%G1899><s%> for <S%G3588><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> people's: <S%G2992><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> he did <S%G4160><s%> once, <S%G2178><s%> when he offered up <S%G399><s%> himself. <S%G1438><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> law <S%G3551><s%> maketh <S%G2525><s%> men <S%G444><s%> high priests <S%G749><s%> which have <S%G2192><s%> infirmity; <S%G769><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> word <S%G3056><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> oath, <S%G3728><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was since <S%G3326><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> law, <S%G3551><s%> maketh the Son, <S%G5207><s%> who is consecrated <S%G5048><s%> forevermore. <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165><s%>
